title: BannerStyleStates
description: Progress Banner Styles in different states.

Progress.description:
Class name of the banner component when the action starts and is in progress.

The string value is a [style class](../Styles/ProgressBannerClass.style.md) name.

Completion.description:
Class name of the banner component after the action gets executed successfully.

The string value is a [style class](../Styles/ProgressBannerClass.style.md) name.
